rComments: Horrible teacher! He lectured on exactly what was in the book. He wrote his tests where they couldn't be finished in the time allotted. HW was poorly worded and got graded down for lack of clarity. Way too much work, expected you to memorize things he causually mentioned in class and memorize absolutely every detail! But he was a nice guy.

I am an A student and i struggled so hard in his class. he gave so much work! weekly homeworks, a ten page lit review paper, two mid terms a final and oral presentatoins. the homeworks were impossible and poorly worded. overall, the class was hell for everyone. inspite of everything, he was a nice guy and enthusiastic.
